description: This dashboard is the one intended for use by the shifter. The others are generally expert level :)

panels.title: TDC Sample to Artdaq Fragment Time
No data window around pull the request window

panels.description:
Shows how much of the /data area on evb01 is being used.

It's set to go orange above 60%, meaning take note, and it's set to go red above 95%, meaning alarm.
panels.title: /data Usage Monitor

title: WR-TDC Monitor
